entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Mascouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:48 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 06:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
